# The `WebAssemblyRegNumbering.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements a pass which assigns <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> register numbers for CodeGen virtual registers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file implements a pass which assigns <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> register numbers for CodeGen virtual registers.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a6c521472c6da6834fae5613839fc5ef9">setWAReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg(), Imm);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then assign regular WebAssembly registers for all remaining used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// virtual registers. TODO: Consider sorting the registers by frequency of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use, to maximize usage of small immediate fields.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVRegs = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo/#ae73582bbbc71758dcac70cd8c56210e4">getNumVirtRegs</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumStackRegs = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Start the numbering for locals after the arg regs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurReg = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#af05f6370f2508ffc40a3600dfb6e2341">getParams</a>().size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VRegIdx = 0; VRegIdx &lt; NumVRegs; ++VRegIdx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> VReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#a1979c563289f871907832e419889f979">Register::index2VirtReg</a>(VRegIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip unused registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.use&#95;empty(VReg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle stackified registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a06bf1d7d3fad0e5185a4ff892c7ad4a5">isVRegStackified</a>(VReg)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;VReg &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(VReg) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; -&gt; WAReg &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; (INT32&#95;MIN | NumStackRegs) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a6c521472c6da6834fae5613839fc5ef9">setWAReg</a>(VReg, INT32&#95;MIN | NumStackRegs++);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
